Product came as described.  No issues . I would recommend this seller if your not worried about the stitching of this item. The tag on this sweatshirt is not stitched very well, you can see through the back of sweatshirt.

I love the quality and how the black is really dark

I simply cannot say enough about the quality of this item. The inside is so soft It fits to size and it's absolutely beautiful. I liked it so much I bought it in a second color. Both of these were for my teen and he absolutely loved them

I ordered this because I thought it was a cool design not knowing until it arrived that it was a knock-off for a black-owned brand that is very popular. The material used is very thick and double layered. The puffy embellishments are applied well, look great, have not crumbled or fallen off. There are no loose threads or uneven seams, but it does not fit when the hood is worn. There is not enough fabric in the hood/head area to properly be worn. He loves to wear it around the house but does not want to wear it in public. The front pocket is large and constructed well. The length is great, it fits well (except the hood), and it is warm. It sort of looks like the original but obviously does not have a label and the embellishments are not evenly spread all over the sweater.
The fabric is decent and it looks good. Received the pants, however. Still, it seems to be a nice fabric that can be worn on many occasions if paired apporpriately.
This hoodie is amazing. It’s soft, vibrant and looks great. Love the design and fit. Glorious!
The quality of print & the materials all feel really well made. The fit is true to size. Love the look and design on this hoodie.
I like the style, also material is very comfortable.  size is slightly larger , so expect that.
Received the pants.The print is nicely made and the material is comfortable.
